Malieson wires 15th instant: "From to-day's wireless, junction has been effected between Bolshevik troops from Orenburg and those from Tashkent. Important developments seem certain and some decision as to (? how omitted) we stand in regard to defence of Persian frontiers seems desirable. Among other results of this junction it is possible Bolsheviks will now send important messages by wire which would mean loss of one very important source of information. I am accordingly endeavouring to send more agents in to Turkestan."Ei
